trans-unit.source: Determines the output files for non-MSBuild project references.
trans-unit.target: Determina os arquivos de saída para referências de projeto não MSBuild.

trans-unit.source: The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs.
trans-unit.target: O `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` tarefa procura por uma propriedade especial definida pelo [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE para a lista de GUIDs de projeto e suas saídas associadas.

trans-unit.source: The IDE only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects and in this way separates [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references from non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] references.
trans-unit.target: O IDE somente previamente resolve não[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projetos e dessa forma separa [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projeto referências de não -[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] referências.

trans-unit.source: The IDE returns the list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences.
trans-unit.target: O IDE retorna a lista de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projetos como UnresolvedProjectReferences.

trans-unit.source: This enables the task to use more powerful [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mechanisms to manipulate just the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references, such as.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que a tarefa usar mais forte [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mecanismos para manipular apenas o [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] referências de projeto, como.

trans-unit.source: calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] and non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.
trans-unit.target: a chamada para destinos específicos de referências para obter o nome do arquivo de manifesto, que não seria possível com uma lista mista de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] e não-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] referências de projeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> caso a execução da tarefa seja bem-sucedida; do contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an XML string containing resolved project outputs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres XML que contém saídas de projeto resolvidas.

trans-unit.source: An XML string containing resolved project outputs.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres XML que contém resolvido saídas do projeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define caminhos de referência resolvidos que preservam os atributos de referência do projeto original.

trans-unit.source: The resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.
trans-unit.target: Os caminhos de referência resolvido preservam os atributos de referência de projeto original.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os itens de referência de projeto que estão no formato [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: Itens de referência que constam de projeto a [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] formato.

trans-unit.source: Since [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: Como [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] somente pré-resolve não[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projetos, os itens de referência de projeto que não puderam ser resolvidos usando a lista previamente resolvida saídas estão no [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] formato.
